channel.title: A list of must have updates
channel.description:
I think these updates are a must have on pimpscape sources..Lol
[u][b]Updates[/b][/u] -Deleted most nulls -Changed port -Add full 9mm revolver -Added commands ::easter, ::announcment etc. -Stoped mass clicking -Added God staffs with constant attack and hardcore graphics -Added Mod Tahroaks compiler -Added Varrock safe -Added santa clause hat turns you into santa - ::unsanta -Added Perfect ancients w/ lvls -Added pking stats by Quest tab -Added ::Range Safe zone -Added pk Box -Become Ghost When you die -Added working Ring Of life -Added Mod Castle -Added Safe zone and pk zone -Made a normal pk server ^.^ -Deleted perfect ring -Added pimping armor -Made server hack proof -Added all new mod island -Added 8second log out -Added fully working mebership -Added fully working genie lamps -Added almost full fishing -Added fully working firemaking -Added working crystal chest -Added Edited coordinate grid.."Your coordinates" -No lagg! Server can go up to 30players! -Added partialy working cwars =\ couldnt finish -Added mod taharoks compiler 1.9 -Changed the bank of runescape -Fixed All dragon hide bodies -Added PKing Skill v.1.2. -Added All new fishing mini game -Added terrorist skill -Added I am Noob spell -Added full range -Fixed glitches in the source such as dropping! -Added welcome message -Added Clue scrolls -Changed logout -Added new starting outfit -Added more commands -Added Dancing nights -Added status- Safezone/pkzone -Added players online -Edited Ardy-->In running man Etc. -Edited main menu -Made new start out point -Added barrows smithing -Added boater skill -Added woodcutting -Added marriage v2 -Added Getting Drunk! -Added new Emotes -Added new spellz -Added fully working whip spec! w/ bar!!! -Deleted about 20 updates that were junk/lagg -Added Webserver - fedexers global objects added -Added more Npc's -Added Venting -Santa Masks -Fixed Beards -Fixed Staffs -Fully working ancients with gfx -Special pk spot -Added working Marriage Updated -Working firemaking -Working fishing -Partial 80% Fletch -7% Farming -Full herbolore
80 Must have updates...
[u][b]Commands[/b][/u] ::Fish ::Fish2 ::Fish3 ::Easter ::God ::Cart ::Hide ::Army ::Wild ::Help ::Announcment ::Etc ::Marriage ::Modisland ::pkbox ::Vent ::deletevarrock ::crackme ::pickup ::char
20 cool commands like 5 are must haves
~Rember~ This is just my UnoScape source This will really improve ur average everyday pimpscape source..

item.title: A list of must have updates
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

I think these updates are a must have on pimpscape sources…Lol

Updates
-Deleted most nulls
-Changed port
-Add full 9mm revolver
-Added commands ::easter, ::announcment etc.
-Stoped mass clicking
-Added God staffs with constant attack and hardcore graphics
-Added Mod Tahroaks compiler
-Added Varrock safe
-Added santa clause hat turns you into santa - ::unsanta
-Added Perfect ancients w/ lvls
-Added pking stats by Quest tab
-Added ::Range Safe zone
-Added pk Box
-Become Ghost When you die
-Added working Ring Of life
-Added Mod Castle
-Added Safe zone and pk zone
-Made a normal pk server ^.^
-Deleted perfect ring
-Added pimping armor
-Made server hack proof
-Added all new mod island
-Added 8second log out
-Added fully working mebership
-Added fully working genie lamps
-Added almost full fishing
-Added fully working firemaking
-Added working crystal chest
-Added Edited coordinate grid…“Your coordinates”
-No lagg! Server can go up to 30players!
-Added partialy working cwars =\ couldnt finish
-Added mod taharoks compiler 1.9
-Changed the bank of runescape
-Fixed All dragon hide bodies
-Added PKing Skill v.1.2.
-Added All new fishing mini game
-Added terrorist skill
-Added I am Noob spell
-Added full range
-Fixed glitches in the source such as dropping!
-Added welcome message
-Added Clue scrolls
-Changed logout
-Added new starting outfit
-Added more commands
-Added Dancing nights
-Added status- Safezone/pkzone
-Added players online
-Edited Ardy–>In running man Etc.
-Edited main menu
-Made new start out point
-Added barrows smithing
-Added boater skill
-Added woodcutting
-Added marriage v2
-Added Getting Drunk!
-Added new Emotes
-Added new spellz
-Added fully working whip spec! w/ bar!!!
-Deleted about 20 updates that were junk/lagg
-Added Webserver

  • fedexers global objects added
    -Added more Npc’s
    -Added Venting
    -Santa Masks
    -Fixed Beards
    -Fixed Staffs
    -Fully working ancients with gfx
    -Special pk spot
    -Added working Marriage Updated
    -Working firemaking
    -Working fishing
    -Partial 80% Fletch
    -7% Farming
    -Full herbolore

80 Must have updates…

Commands
::Fish
::Fish2
::Fish3
::Easter
::God
::Cart
::Hide
::Army
::Wild
::Help
::Announcment
::Etc
::Marriage
::Modisland
::pkbox
::Vent
::deletevarrock
::crackme
::pickup
::char

20 cool commands like 5 are must haves

~Rember~ This is just my UnoScape source This will really improve ur average everyday pimpscape source…
